name: ReviewOfCurrentMedicationsDeclinedByPatientSNOMEDCT
title: Review of Current Medications Declined by Patient (SNOMEDCT)
description: This value set includes SNOMED concepts for patient refusal of of review of current medications.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes SNOMED concepts for patient decision not to participation in a review of current medications.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who decide not to participate in a review of current medications. This element may map to the  "Negation Rationale" attribute of the "Assessment" or "Intervention" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts for patient decision not to participation in medication review.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes reasons that do not involve conscious decision on part of patient to not participate, e.g., patient unconscious or unable to communicate.)
